questions.question: 契約内容にご不明な点がございましたら、（  ）お問い合わせください。
questions.hint:
契約内容（けいやくないよう, keiyakunaiyou）- contract terms
問い合わせ（といあわせ, toiawase）- inquiry

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 遠慮なく（えんりょなく, enryo naku）- without hesitation

  • しぶしぶ（shibushibu）- reluctantly
  • やむをえず（yamuwoezu）- unwillingly; inevitably
  • うっかり（ukkari）- carelessly

English Translation: If you have any questions about the contract, feel free to ask.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 遠慮なく（えんりょなく, enryo naku）- without hesitation

  • しぶしぶ（shibushibu）- reluctantly
  • やむをえず（yamuwoezu）- unwillingly; inevitably
  • うっかり（ukkari）- carelessly

English Translation: If you have any questions about the contract, feel free to ask.

questions.question: プロジェクトの成功は、彼の努力（  ）ものだった。
questions.hint:
成功（せいこう, seikou）- success
努力（どりょく, doryoku）- effort

explanation.correct:
Correct! : にほかならない（ni hoka naranai）- nothing but; solely

  • にわたらない（ni wataranai）- does not extend to
  • にかまわない（ni kamawanai）- does not matter
  • にすぎない（ni suginai）- no more than

English Translation: The project’s success was nothing but the result of his efforts.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: にほかならない（ni hoka naranai）- nothing but; solely

  • にわたらない（ni wataranai）- does not extend to
  • にかまわない（ni kamawanai）- does not matter
  • にすぎない（ni suginai）- no more than

English Translation: The project’s success was nothing but the result of his efforts.

questions.question: 説明会は午後2時より（  ）いたします。
questions.hint:
説明会（せつめいかい, setsumeikai）- briefing session
午後（ごご, gogo）- afternoon

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 開催（かいさい, kaisai）- holding (an event)

  • 終了（しゅうりょう, shuuryou）- end
  • 修了（しゅうりょう, shuuryou）- completion (of a course)
  • 履修（りしゅう, rishuu）- taking (a course)

English Translation: The briefing session will be held from 2 PM.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 開催（かいさい, kaisai）- holding (an event)

  • 終了（しゅうりょう, shuuryou）- end
  • 修了（しゅうりょう, shuuryou）- completion (of a course)
  • 履修（りしゅう, rishuu）- taking (a course)

English Translation: The briefing session will be held from 2 PM.

questions.question: 担当者が（  ）お伺いいたしますので、少々お待ちください。
questions.hint:
担当者（たんとうしゃ, tantousha）- person in charge
伺う（うかがう, ukagau）- to visit; to come (humble)

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 間もなく（まもなく, mamonaku）- shortly

  • それとなく（soretonaku）- indirectly
  • なまぬるく（namanuruku）- lukewarmly
  • あやふやに（ayafuya ni）- vaguely

English Translation: The person in charge will be with you shortly. Please wait a moment.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 間もなく（まもなく, mamonaku）- shortly

  • それとなく（soretonaku）- indirectly
  • なまぬるく（namanuruku）- lukewarmly
  • あやふやに（ayafuya ni）- vaguely

English Translation: The person in charge will be with you shortly. Please wait a moment.
